website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Duramo Lite is a neutral road running that’s light and breathable, perfect for various exercises and daily running sessions. Because of its minimalistic design, it can also be worn as a casual sneaker during rest days or workdays. Whatever the case, the Adidas Duramo Lite is a good choice for shoes with a versatile purpose.
pros: A majority of users commented on how comfortable the shoes are when worn
The cushioning felt adequate, most of the testers accounted
The Adidas Duramo Lite was worn as a casual sneaker as well as a gym companion by several testers
It’s a great starter shoe for light running and cross-training, based on various testers’ reviews
Users were glad to say that the shoes are budget-friendly
cons: Several wearers found the outsole to wear out quickly
Some users have observed that the upper of the shoes were easily damaged only after a few months of wearing them

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfy and look good
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these. Very light and comfortable and they fit perfectly (although my feet aren't particularly wide so you may need a size up if you have wide feet). Look good and feel good. Only just got them so will gain or lose a star depending on how they last. Seem to be well made so happy to recommend Edit - increased to 5 star as they are lasting very well with no signs of fading after over 6 months of regular use
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Seller was fine trainers are poor in the wet.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst trainers I've ever had for running in damp weather. It's like running on ice at times even after a bit of light drizzle. If the ground is slightly damp and you have to run on paved surfaces you're taking you chances and if effects your pace. They're comfortable and OK in the dry weather but hey, this is Britain.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: As with most Adidas Trainers it's best to get a slightly bigger size, I'm a 10 so I bought a 10.5 & the fit is good, I've not had them long but they seem quite a good shoe for £40, I don't think I would like to run far in them but they're ok as just a pair of day to day trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality trainers
customer_reviews.text: Good quality trainers, hard wearing this is my second pair the others lasted two years and I still wear them also great price considering the price of all the other trainers
customer_reviews.author: John graves

customer_reviews.title: Good feel and fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit! Perfect for walking and running, happy to get another pair if I ever wear these out
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Very good and fast service
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I plan on buying again once these wear out. Fast service from supplier. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Gismo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite a tight fit compared to my sons other trainers from adidas. He likes the style.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Within a few weeks my big toes wore holes through the top of the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carter

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for me. I hope I can get more...
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of trainers for running
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of trainers for running. I usually buy New Balance, but am pleasantly surprised how light and comfortable these are.
customer_reviews.author: dazh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I find these trainers to be super comfortable and light on feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but slightly small sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, light and comfortable. Sizing a bit small - go half a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are Adidas. & unbelievable low price. Says it all really
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the feel very comfortable under foot almost memory foam like
customer_reviews.author: andrew chamley

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and nice but not really worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Koda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely trainers for my son. Fitted perfectly. Great value
customer_reviews.author: SEL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable fit well, light weight, I only use these for general wear but this is my 3rd pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Normally a UK 10 and the 10 1/2 was spot on
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: These are the best fitting and feeling trainers I have bought
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are the best fitting and feeling trainers I have bought. It is a real pleasure wearing them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Duramo Lite Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Duramo Lite m men's adidas running shoes made of breathable uppers and breathable mesh lining. Lace-up closures for snug fit. Cloudfoam midsole for cushioned step. Waffle patterned adiwear sturdy rubber outsole. Shoes are suitable for running and casual wear and mark with adidas signature brand.
feature_bullets: Ventilated mesh outer for maximum breathability
ADIWEAR outsole provides the ultimate in durability and strength
